name: Google Sheets
purpose: Cloud-based spreadsheet platform for data storage, organization, and collaboration
description: Google Sheets is a cloud-based spreadsheet application that enables users to create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets in real-time. It supports data import/export, API integration, automation via Google Apps Script, and seamless integration with other Google Workspace tools. Widely used for data storage, analysis, reporting, and as a destination for automated data exports from various tools and platforms.

use_cases: Store scraped data from Browse AI

strengths: Google Apps Script for custom automation
limitations: Performance issues with very large datasets
Less powerful than Excel for complex calculations

alternatives.name: Microsoft Excel
alternatives.comparison: Excel is more powerful but requires Office subscription, less collaborative

alternatives.name: Airtable
alternatives.comparison: Airtable is more database-like, better for complex relationships

alternatives.name: Notion
alternatives.comparison: Notion is more document-focused, less spreadsheet-oriented

video_source.video_title: This AI Agent Will DO Your Work For You! (Browse AI)
video_source.creator: The AI Advantage (Igor)

skills_referenced: SKL-005: analyzed recruitment data in Google Sheets
